Name: PRISON OF SON
About the game: In the center of the cosmos of Russ, a tower exists, the name of that tower is 'PRISON OF SON'. In this tower, the sons of man are sentenced to be imprisoned forever. The reason why they are sent there, no one knows, but one thing is for sure. That you can escape, and bring an end to the eternal loop of false judgement that has fallen upon you. You are one of the prisoners, you don't know for what reason you are here. The only thing you know is that you want to escape and learn the truth. You must escape, you must do it because if you don't, then who will save you from the eternal doom? Prison of son is a text based indie game created in language c and its purpose is to give a small awake to users about their knowledge in history and geography of the world. The player in his way out explore the prison and try to solve ridles that will help him to find the keys to escape.So try to have fun and enjoy it.
